articles.description: Sportsmail understands Haydn Snape, a 30-year-old businessman who made his fortune in cryptocurrency, has assumed a role within the consortium to push a deal through.
articles.content:
Birmingham City's protracted takeover took another twist on Sunday as it emerged a new backer has joined forces with prospective owner Paul Richardson.

articles.title: Qatari minister blasts 'arrogant' critics of World Cup host's repressive anti-LGBT laws - Daily Mail

articles.content: Qatar's foreign minister has said the country's critics are 'arrogant' and 'cannot accept a small country from the Middle East' is hosting the World Cup, amid criticism of the nation's LGBTQ rights r… [+6456 chars]

articles.description: TOM COLLOMOSSE AT VILLA PARK: The Brazil playmaker was already facing an uphill struggle to make the squad due to a loss of form and lack of regular action, and this is a further blow.
